StringTable.Label: HoloTheater_Name
StringTable.String: Holo Theater

StringTable.Label: HoloTheater_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a place for all beings to be entertained with news and stories.

StringTable.Label: NetworkNexus_Name
StringTable.String: Network Nexus

StringTable.Label: NetworkNexus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Central hub for bio-electric research communication.

StringTable.Label: IrradiatedFoundry_Name
StringTable.String: Irradiated Foundry

StringTable.Label: IrradiatedFoundry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Radiation-fueled production hub that grows based on surrounding districts.

StringTable.Label: ContagionSource_Name
StringTable.String: Contagion Source

StringTable.Label: ContagionSource_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Propagation center for cosmic infection increases mitosis rate.

StringTable.Label: Golgi_Name
StringTable.String: Golgi

StringTable.Label: Golgi_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Central hub for cellular processing and distant vision..

StringTable.Label: Incubator_Name
StringTable.String: Amoebic Incubator

StringTable.Label: Incubator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Site for accelerated growth and fission.

StringTable.Label: KnowledgeMeld_Name
StringTable.String: Knowledge Melding Hub

StringTable.Label: KnowledgeMeld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Convergence point for compelled shared understanding.

StringTable.Label: HiveWorkerTraining_Name
StringTable.String: Work Instruction Chamber

StringTable.Label: HiveWorkerTraining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A facility to elevate [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] population [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS] by 50%%. Effect increases as it levels up.

StringTable.Label: BrainBugs_Name
StringTable.String: Cerebral Chamber

StringTable.Label: BrainBugs_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Epicenter for increasing [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] population [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS] by 50%%. Effect increases as it levels up.

StringTable.Label: SocialBugs_Name
StringTable.String: Harmonious Antennae

StringTable.Label: SocialBugs_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enhancing [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS]unity by increasing [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS] skills by 50%%. Effect increases as it levels up..

StringTable.Label: Hatchery_Name
StringTable.String: Hatchery

StringTable.Label: Hatchery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Birthplace of the next generation [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] citizens. Greatly increases growth.

StringTable.Label: WorkHive_Name
StringTable.String: Work Hive

StringTable.Label: WorkHive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Productive hub for the worker caste of [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] by increasing their [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MotherHive_Name
StringTable.String: Mother Hive

StringTable.Label: MotherHive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Central hub for [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] species on this world. Increases the stats of all creatures with the [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] trait.
